method.name: stripSourceCode
method.description: Strips specific comments from the code

parameter.name: $sourceCode
parameter.description: The code from which to strip comments

method.name: pretifySourceCode
method.description: Position comment blocks in specific spots in the given code

parameter.name: $sourceCode
parameter.description: The code to comment

parameter.name: $manual
parameter.description: The code's manual from which the comment blocks will be created.

parameter.name: $library
parameter.description: Code class' library

parameter.name: $package
parameter.description: Code class' package

parameter.name: $namespace
parameter.description: Code class' namespace

method.name: getDescriptionLine
method.description: Creates and returns a line for a comment block

parameter.name: $values
parameter.description: Values to present in the line

parameter.name: $tag
parameter.description: Tag name of the line

parameter.name: $tabs
parameter.description: Number of tabs between tag and values

method.name: getClassStampComments
method.description: Creates and returns a comment block that holds the objects generic info, such as library, namespace, etc

parameter.name: $library
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's library

parameter.name: $package
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's package

parameter.name: $namespace
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's namespace

method.name: getClassInfoComments
method.description: Creates and returns a comment block that holds the objects class info, such as description, version, etc

parameter.name: $title
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's title

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's description

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's version

parameter.name: $created
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's creation date. Should be an integer or string timestamp

parameter.name: $revised
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's last modification date. Should be an integer or string unformated timestamp

parameter.name: $throws
parameter.description: The exceptions thrown in the class. Should be a comma separated string.

parameter.name: $deprecated
parameter.description: This value is presented as the object's deprecation description.

method.name: getPropertyComments
method.description: Creates and returns a comment block that holds a class' property info, namely description and type.

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: This value is presented as the property's description.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: This value is presented as the property's type.

method.name: getMethodComments
method.description: Creates and returns a comment block that holds an objects method info, such as description, return value, etc

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: This value is presented as the method's description.

parameter.name: $args
parameter.description: Holds the method parameters' info. Should have the following keys: 'type', 'name', 'description'.

parameter.name: $return
parameter.description: This value is presented as the method's return type.

parameter.name: $returnDesc
parameter.description: The description of the returning value, if not void

parameter.name: $throws
parameter.description: The exceptions thrown by the method. Should be a comma separated string

parameter.name: $deprecated
parameter.description: This value is presented as the method's deprecation description.
